quoteEN: You always gain by giving love.
author: ❤ Reese Witherspoon ❤

quoteEN: All that you are is all that I’ll ever need.
quoteES: Todo lo que eres es todo lo que necesitaré.
author: ❤ Ed Sheeran ❤

quoteEN: I love her, and that’s the beginning and end of everything.
quoteES: La amo, y ese es el principio y el final de todo.
author: ❤ F. Scott Fitzgerald  ❤

quoteEN: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quoteES: El amor se compone de una sola alma que habita en dos cuerpos.
author: ❤Aristóteles❤

quoteEN: We are most alive when we're in love.
quoteES: Estamos más vivos cuando estamos enamorados.
author: ❤ John Updike ❤

quoteEN: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
quoteES: No hay encanto igual a la ternura de corazón.
author: ❤ Jane Austen ❤

quoteEN: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.
quoteES: El corazón tiene sus razones, razón por la cual no sabe nada.
author: ❤ Blaise Pascal ❤

quoteEN: Love is friendship that has caught fire.
quoteES: El amor es la amistad que se ha incendiado.
author: ❤ Ann Landers ❤

quoteEN: Love yourself first and everything falls into line.
quoteES: Ámate a ti mismo primero y todo encaja.
author: ❤ Lucille Ball ❤

quoteEN: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quoteES: No se puede culpar a la gravedad por enamorarse.
author: ❤ Albert Einstein ❤

quoteEN: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.
quoteES: Si encuentras a alguien que amas en tu vida, entonces quédate con ese amor.
author: ❤ Princess Diana ❤

quoteEN: I think I'd miss you even if we never met.
quoteES: Creo que te extrañaría incluso si nunca nos conociéramos.
author: ❤The Wedding Date❤

quoteEN: I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
quoteES: Me enamoré de la forma en que te duermes: lentamente, y luego todo a la vez.
author: ❤John Green, -The Fault in Our Stars-❤

quoteEN: A simple -I love you- means more than money.
quoteES: Un simple -Te amo- significa más que dinero.
author: ❤ Frank Sinatra ❤

quoteEN: Everything I do, I do it for you.
quoteES: Todo lo que hago, lo hago por ti.
author: ❤ Bryan Adams ❤
